languages.text: "Молодой Гапрак прав. Ксеносы — это не только угроза, но и возможности".

traits.locale_text: "Молодой Гапрак прав. Ксеносы — это не только угроза, но и возможности".

languages.text: "Young Gaprak is right. The xenos are not just a threat — they are also an opportunity."
languages.original_text: "Молодой Гапрак прав. Ксеносы — это не только угроза, но и возможности".

traits.locale_text: "Young Gaprak is right. The xenos are not just a threat — they are also an opportunity."
"Young Gaprak is right. The xenos are not just a threat — they are also an opportunity."
"Young Gaprak is right. The xenos are not just a threat — they are also an opportunity."
"Young Gaprak is right. The xenos are not just a threat — they are also an opportunity."
"Young Gaprak is right. The xenos are not just a threat — they are also an opportunity."

languages.text: 「ヤング・ギャプラックの言うとおりだ。異種族はただの脅威ではない…好機でもあるのだ」
languages.original_text: "Young Gaprak is right. The xenos are not just a threat — they are also an opportunity."

traits.locale_text: 「ヤング・ギャプラックの言うとおりだ。異種族はただの脅威ではない…好機でもあるのだ」

languages.text: “年轻的贾帕克说得没错，异形不仅仅是威胁，也同样是机遇。”
languages.original_text: "Young Gaprak is right. The xenos are not just a threat — they are also an opportunity."

traits.locale_text: “年轻的贾帕克说得没错，异形不仅仅是威胁，也同样是机遇。”

languages.text: «El joven Gaprak tiene razón. Los xenos no son solo una amenaza. También son una oportunidad».
languages.original_text: "Young Gaprak is right. The xenos are not just a threat — they are also an opportunity."

traits.locale_text: «El joven Gaprak tiene razón. Los xenos no son solo una amenaza. También son una oportunidad».

languages.text: « Le jeune Gaprak a raison. Plus qu'une menace, les xénos sont une opportunité. »
languages.original_text: "Young Gaprak is right. The xenos are not just a threat — they are also an opportunity."

traits.locale_text: « Le jeune Gaprak a raison. Plus qu'une menace, les xénos sont une opportunité. »

languages.text: "Der junge Gaprak hat recht. Die Xenos sind nicht einfach eine Bedrohung – sie sind auch eine Gelegenheit."
languages.original_text: "Young Gaprak is right. The xenos are not just a threat — they are also an opportunity."

traits.locale_text: "Der junge Gaprak hat recht. Die Xenos sind nicht einfach eine Bedrohung – sie sind auch eine Gelegenheit."

languages.text: "Genç Gaprak haklı. Zenolar, sırf tehditten ibaret değil... Bizim için birer fırsatlar."
languages.original_text: "Young Gaprak is right. The xenos are not just a threat — they are also an opportunity."

traits.locale_text: "Genç Gaprak haklı. Zenolar, sırf bir tehditten ibaret değil... Ayrıca bizim için bir fırsat."
